actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to secure to physically handicapped workers employed in sheltered workshops the right to organize and bargain collectively.

summary.text: Includes handicapped workers employed in sheltered workships within the provisions of the National Labor Relations Act. Defines "sheltered workshop" as meaning a place where any manufacture or handiwork is carried on and which is operated for the primary purpose of providing employment for physically handicapped persons.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to secure to physically handicapped workers employed in sheltered workshops the right to organize and bargain collectively.
